title: Thresh Isn't Ranged or Melee?
body:
Relic's shield passive doesn't work on Thresh (although the passive on his flay does make it easy enough to dish out the damage).
He can't buy Runaan's so he isn't a ranged champion.

Make one of the two items work would be my suggestion.

(And to anyone who asks, yes you used to be able to buy Runaan's and Thresh worked like a range champion before patch 5.22).

Thanks

replies.body: Pardon my French, but it's fucking annoying that the passive on the _recommended_ starting item for Thresh, relic shield, doesn't work. You have to max your E first if you want any chance at last hitting.

Or you know, be able to last hit with your ad, which everyone else does.

Besides, it's recommended even though you can't use it to your fullest extent because it covers thresh's most gaping weakness. Isn't that just a testament to thresh being so strong he doesn't even need an item's full power to have it be super useful?
Apparently we can't decide if Thresh using a kusarigama counts as melee or ranged... and neither can the game code.
I think it's more of the fact that he doesn't shoot a projectile, so Runaan's is staring at him like 'WHAT DO I SHOOT? SCYTHES AT PEOPLE?'

This, just this.

We need more inexplicable silliness in the game.
